We’re updating the app frequently to make it better for you:

• Extend and stop your parking on the apple watch
• We are listening to your feedback - Tap the end time above the wheel to set longer parking times
• Want your friends to use the app? Use our referral program
• You will get notified in advance when your credit card expires
• Various bug fixes and performance improvements

Our app updates can include new features, performance improvements and general changes based on your feedback. We’re working hard to always provide a pleasant EasyPark experience for you.

Our app updates can include new features, performance improvements and general changes based on your feedback. We’re working hard to always provide a pleasant EasyPark experience for you:

• Improved offline behaviour
Our app updates can include new features, performance improvements and general changes based on your feedback. We’re working hard to always provide a pleasant EasyPark experience for you.

Our app updates can include new features, performance improvements and general changes based on your feedback. We’re working hard to always provide a pleasant EasyPark experience for you:

• Some areas show you more detailed information on the parking times now.
• More areas will show you area information when starting a parking.

- Some areas now support fixed time parking periods
- Some areas will now display important additional information and warnings when you start a parking

- Now some areas warn about residential parking restrictions on street level.
- More areas warn users who try to park outside taxable times.
- More accurate error messages have been added to some areas
- Your phone number will now be saved in the log in field after you have logged out.

- Now some areas warn about residential parking restrictions on street level.
- More areas warn users who try to park outside taxable times.
- More accurate error messages have been added to some areas
- Your phone number will now be saved in the log in field after you have logged out.

- We have done some general bug fixes
- Business users can now update and add a credit card in the app.
- Business account owners can now enable car and business hour restrictions to their users.
- Business users can now add a new private account or switch to their private account in the app.
- We have done some general bug fixes

- We have done some general bug fixes
- We now provide information about current traffic conditions through voice aid

- Users can now see the parking availability and price at many parking lots and garages in FIND.
- We have added improved warnings in case of poor internet connection.
- We have done several important bug fixes.
- We have done several bug fixes.

- You can now use Apple Pay for areas that offer free parking for a limited time.
- We have done several bug fixes.

- It is now easier to save money through helpful reminders and we guide you to the right settings.
- We have done several bug fixes.

- We have made it easier and more intuitive to select the right car when you have registered multiple vehicles.
- We have done several bug fixes.

- We now offer two factor verification for your account in the case you try to log in from another device.
- Now you get a better overview of price, time tables and type of parking in our details button when selecting a parking.
- You can now more easily opt-in and out of marketing communication
- We have done several bug fixes.

- You can now switch car for active bucket parkings if you accidentally chose the wrong car.
- We have done several bug fixes.

- We have clarified the information displayed in our details view to better cover all types of parking
- We have done several bug fixes.
- We have done several bug fixes.

- We have created a landing page for CameraPark where you can get a broader understanding of what it is and opt-in your vehicles for CameraPark.
- We have done several bug fixes.
We have done several bug fixes.
We have done several bug fixes.
We have done several bug fixes.
We have done several bug fixes.

- You can now opt in your car for CameraPark during registration
- You can now charge your EV and start a bucket parking while you have an ongoing CameraPark session.
- We have done several bug fixes.

We have done several app improvements and fixes.

- You can now enjoy EasyPark in Montenegro.
- We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes
We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes.

We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes.

- Now we show you vacated spots in real time on the map so that you can find parking faster. Available in Berlin, Barcelona, Turin, Hamburg, Hanover, Salzburg, Cologne, Madrid, Rome, Stockholm, Copenhagen, Oslo, Helsinki, Stavanger, Rotterdam and many others!
- We have updated the color scheme so that you can enjoy Dark Mode with the iOS 13 update.

- Now we show you vacated spots in real time on the map so that you can find parking faster. Available in Berlin, Barcelona, Turin, Hamburg, Hanover, Salzburg, Cologne, Madrid, Rome, Stockholm, Copenhagen, Oslo, Helsinki, Stavanger, Rotterdam and many others!
- We have updated the color scheme so that you can enjoy Dark Mode with the iOS 13 update.
- Quicker re-entry to the app: no more passwords, re-entry by using a code verification sent to your phone.
We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes
- We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes

- Schedule your bucket parking to start later on certain areas.
- New country: Iceland! EasyPark coverage grows and now we're making parking easier in 18 countries.
- Do you have EasyPark promo code? Our promo code feature has now improved. Insert the code in the ‘Payment’ section and see the value, value remaining and expiry date of each code there.
- We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes.
- We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes.

We highly respect your privacy and only use your location during an ongoing parking and with your permission. When you enable location permissions and activate drive-away alert reminders in the app, you have the chance to stop the parking in time and by doing so also save money.
- We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes
- We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes.
We have fixed a bug causing some users to get logged out and prevented from entering the app again.

- New country: New Zealand! We’re expanding and are now making your parking easier in 21 countries.
- We have made some adjustments on the wheel screen to help users avoid accidentally stopping the parking while spinning the wheel.
We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes.

- Apple CarPlay compatible. Connect your phone to CarPlay and use EasyPark in the car. You may start and stop the parking easily on the car's display, and prolong the parking via your phone while being on-the-go.

- Apple CarPlay compatible. Connect your phone to CarPlay and use EasyPark in the car. You may start and stop the parking easily on the car's display, and prolong the parking via your phone while being on-the-go.
We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes.
We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes.
Help -section in the menu bar is fixed and it is now guiding you to your local Help -page. Here you will find the answers to the most frequently asked questions about the app.
- We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes.
- We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes
We are constantly tweaking our app to improve your experience. Your parking in a city hasn’t ever been this easy!
This release contains small adjustments and improvements made for you. You might not notice those, but the app is now even better than it was yesterday.
- Easier B2B account activation: if your company already has EasyPark business subscription, you can request to be added as a user under your company account directly from the app.
- We are making urban life easier. Now with several app improvements and fixes.
